title: HLDD HANDLANDY UltraLight Safety Work Gloves, Mens & Women Multi-Functional Work Gloves with Extensive Palm Protection, Mechanic Gardening Construction DIY Gloves with Touchscreen (Small, Green)
features: MATERIAL - Mesh and Spandex breathable back with padded knuckles keeps your hands cool, comfortable and flexible. Synthetic Microfiber Foam Padded Palm ensure your hands comfortable and Safe.
DESIGN - Foam Padded with ergonomic design pattern ensure you comfortable and flexible fitting during using the hand tools. Ultralight and High Dexterity Work Gloves design fits your hands perfectly.
DETAILS - Soft fitting cuff and dust stop: Velcro Hook loop closure cuff easy for on and off, and dust stop during work place. 3 Fingertips with touchscreen design.
TERRY CLOTH - Soft Terry cloth design on the thumb, convenient to wipe sweat away.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL - High Visibility Bright color design, Perfect Fit for Men & Women, these Ultralight Work Gloves ideal for Mechanic, Construction, Yardwork, Driver, Gardening, Farming, Landscaping, DIY projects, Warehouse, Travel, Fishing, etc..
